trans-unit.source: Adds detailed statistics for each product to the Stats dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Dodaje detaljnu statistiku za svaki proizvod na kontrolnu tablu Statistike.

trans-unit.source: Number of purchases compared to number of views
trans-unit.target: Broj kupovina u poređenju s brojem pregleda

trans-unit.source: After choosing a category and selecting a product, informational graphs will appear.
trans-unit.target: Broj kupovina u poređenju s brojem pregleda

trans-unit.source: If you notice that a product is often purchased but viewed infrequently, you should display it more prominently in your Front Office.
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko primjetite da je proizvod često kupljen, ali slabo pregledavan, trebali bi ga postaviti na vidljivije mjesto ili na početnu stranu trgovine.
